about_the_game:
DEVELOPMENT IS PAUSED UNTIL THE LAUNCH OF MY OTHER GAME: SCARSEEKER

Colonizer is an action-platforming game with a hand-drawn and classic animated style, set deep in space. The first of your kind to reach this galaxy, you must traverse dangerous planets filled with hostile aliens as you clear the way for colonization. Find and interact with landing pods that contain your much-needed weapons and gear unlocking new abilities and fun combat. In addition to action-platforming, compete for high scores in multiple arcade game modes that are woven into the gameplay experience. Colonizer features soulslite combat with a low floor and high ceiling, for continued progression and replayability.

Features a retro-futuristic style and expansive synthwave and chillwave soundtrack.

short_description: Explore a vast galaxy of undiscovered worlds filled with hostile aliens and extreme landscapes, as you search for a new home planet. Uncover secrets, upgrade abilities, unlock weapons and defeat bizarre enemies in a unique game that seamlessly blends action-platforming and arcade-like challenges.
